testcase.name: Successfully registered an account
testcase.system-out: Given Open the browser......................................................passed When Enter the URL "http://practice.automationtesting.in/"..................passed And Click on My Account Menu................................................passed And Enter registered Email Address with "ngoclong09.thaihoa@gmail.com" in Email-Address textbox.passed And Enter your own password with "NgocLong!@#$%^&*(" in password textbox....passed And Click on Register button................................................passed Then User will be registered successfully and will be navigated to the Home page.passed
